topic.title: Supported Processors for XSLT / XQuery Debugging

body.p: The following built-in XSLT processors are integrated in the debugger and can be selected in the Control Toolbar:

ul.li: Saxon HE (Home Edition) - a limited version of the Saxon 9 processor, capable of running XSLT 1.0, XSLT 2.0 / 3.0 basic and XQuery 1.0 transformations, available in both the XSLT debugger and the XQuery one,
Saxon PE (Professional Edition) - capable of running XSLT 1.0 transformations, XSLT 2.0 basic ones and XQuery 1.0 ones, available in both the XSLT debugger and the XQuery one,

Saxon EE (Enterprise Edition) - a schema aware processor, capable of running XSLT 1.0 transformations, XSLT 2.0 /3.0 basic ones, XSLT 2.0 / 3.0 schema aware ones and XQuery 1.0 / 3.0 ones, available in both the XSLT debugger and the XQuery debugger,
Saxon - capable of running only XSLT 1.0 transformations, available only in the XSLT debugger,
Xalan - capable of running only XSLT 1.0 transformations, available only in the XSLT debugger.
